game.name: Princesses Christmas Party
game.description:
Christmas festival is just about to come and your favorite Disney princess Anna has planned to hold a wonderful party on the eve of this biggest celebration of the year! She has lots of preparations to make for this special holiday. Being alone at home, the princess gets confused where to start. Would you help her out? Join Princesses Christmas Party game and get ready to handle different home chores like changing sofa, rug, curtains, Christmas tree, Fireplace and more!

You would also have to play the role of a fashion stylist in this brand new dressing game for girls and guide the princesses to pick up the suitable outfit. Anna and her friend Elsa also need your fashion advice for their new Christmas looks. Other princesses like Ariel and Aurora would also attend the party. Firstly, decorate the room with the items you can see at the bottom of the screen of this html5 decoration game. Give it a pair of matching curtains, rug, an elegant sofa and a Christmas tree and put some gifts under the tree!

Once you are done, click the next button and be prepared to dress up the princesses with available outfits in the store. Give Anna a nice red color dress and match it with a red Christmas cap, a pair of red long shoes, a lovely hairstyle and a gift item in her hand! Hurry up, ladies! Her friend Elsa is also waiting for her turn. Dress her up with the cute dress and accessory options! Do your best to create the awesome festive looks for the two pretty girls in this one of the best games for kids to play online, no download required!
